title: Disable/Remap Zoom in and out in new launcher?
body:
My Wheel on my mouse is broken,and sometimes if i zoom in while playing then i have a big problem zooming out,especially while in combat.

I cant find out how to disable zooming in in input.ini file since the new launcher no longer uses it.
I tried messing with the game.cfg file with no luck.

Anyone has ANY idea of how to disable or remap the zoom in+out?

Please refrain from comments like "Hur dur buy new mouse" since i have this problem on 2 computers with 2 mouses and they are both for gaming,and i am not going to buy 2 new gaming mouses just for that.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, there isn't an option to disable this in the client. Since we don't support custom modifications to League's files, I won't be able to assist with any other method of disabling this.

Since you're not able to replace the mice, you may be able to configure the mouse wheel to a blank action or a key that doesn't do anything in League to prevent the zoom issues happening in a match. You'll have to do this through any sort of software your gaming mice would have shipped with. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
